name: Dr. Mikio Hiraiwa-Supervised Yomu Tore GO!
summary: Dr. Mikio Hiraiwa-Supervised Yomu Tore GO! is for people with dyslexia and with reading difficulties. It has three training methods: reading letters aloud by using the included microphone, recognizing letters as units of sounds, and turning the sounds into letters. There are prepared 6 games, 54 levels, and 227 stages.
